post.author: Ivan_the_B
post.body:
What happened to the previous poll?

edit:Seems like I have to vote again

post.author: afullo
post.body: Neurological FTW again!

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
Ivan_the_B wrote:
What happened to the previous poll?


was suggested a new thread be started to give it more attention. bad side: everybody needs to vote again (bna could most likely log in as everybody & re-cast their vote, but i wouldn't be comfortable with asking & I doubt he's be comfortable/want to do that).

good side: less clutter in a thread about the poll.

post.author: BNA!
post.body:
Thanks for the seperate thread.

You don't have to use imageshack - you can upload your images here as well.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
BNA! wrote:
Thanks for the seperate thread.


You're welcome. Worthy note: the other thread's 1st post is being updated with news posts I see about the contest.

Quote:
You don't have to use imageshack - you can upload your images here as well.


doh! But it will save your bandwidth some what. Tried to use the links from moddb but they didn't work, didn't try planetdoom's links.

BTW, check out planetdoom's Pic of the Day.

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
The Happy Friar wrote:
BTW, check out planetdoom's Pic of the Day.

That's Cool! It will promote our Contests!

doh! But it will save your bandwidth some what.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: as a favor, please don't release any updates until AFTER voting. People should vote on the submitted bosses, not fixed ones.

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
The Happy Friar wrote:
as a favor, please don't release any updates until AFTER voting. People should vote on the submitted bosses, not fixed ones.

Of course, that's why i'm taking my time!

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: Come on... we've got to have MORE then *SEVENTEEN* people on this board who are active!!!!!!

post.author: der_ton
post.body: I haven't voted yet, but now that I replaced my really old 19'' CRT which got darker every day with a new 23'' display (2048x1152) since yesterday I'll treat myself to you guys' creations in total über-HD.

post.author: Pat AfterMoon
post.body:
The next time we should polish our communication, particularly the screenshot published outside Doom3world (ModDB, PlanetDoom, ...).
I'm sure a lot of participants will take more care on that

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: yeah, next time the authors need to get a few good screens!

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
Yeah! Authors are really some big... HEY! Wait a minute!
Personnally, i didn't had the time to get some really good screenies the very last day... plus too much screenshots kill the surprise!
(ok, well... 1 or 2 screens are not 'too much')

post.author: BNA!
post.body:
Actually the screens are unpronouncable bad. Showing a level shot instead of a monster is, well, I can't shake my head fast enough.

The next time authors should really really take better control of what media is getting released. This contest with all good intentions did not even scratch on the surface of the possible poential.

Skills is one thing, but it's nothing without proper presentation.

I'm guilty of not giving a helping hand (and didn't got asked to do so), but I've been very curious to see what the outcome is without me disturbing the whole thing.

I'm pleased that the contest took place, but next time I'd be glad if I would be allowed to offer a little advice.

post.author: Pat AfterMoon
post.body:
BNA! wrote:
Skills is one thing, but it's nothing without proper presentation.
+1
We've all learned a lot of things, we will do better the next time.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
BNA! wrote:
but next time I'd be glad if I would be allowed to offer a little advice.


please, start now!
